name: Low
description: No immediate resolution needed if there are other priorities. It does not threaten anyone’s health or safety. It does not threaten infrastructure use or performance.

name: Medium
description: No immediate resolution needed if there are higher priorities. It does not threaten anyone’s health or safety. Infrastructure use or performance may be involved so long it doesn’t affect a person’s safety.

name: High
description: Immediate attention needed by a designated Event Manager. It may threaten a person’s health or safety if not immediately addressed.

name: Critical
description: Immediate attention required. Someone’s health or safety is at risk in a possibly life threatening situation. Key infrastructure is at risk with the possibility of mass casualty if not immediately addressed. Designated Event Directors should be notified.
